fields.description:
{html}

Hi.

I really need help on this. I've been trying to integrate urbanairships code that explained on the blog but I don't know how to do it.

I'm trying to make a simple app with push notification on it. I succeeded using the sample and it worked but this require me to click on the registration button and adding an alies name. and I don't want that i just want it to register it self with no alies name.

Please help. Thanks.

{html}
fields.summary: Need help integration urbanAirship push notification
